item.description:
Kayak the Souhegan River - an easy, beginner level paddling event
Saturday May 23th., 11 am. Till 3 pm.
38 Turkey Hill rd.
Merrimack NH. 03054

603-491-1962 Host: Steve O. ob@tds.net
603-557-6055 Bill_J bill@imaginetworks.com

IF IT IS RAINY OR IT IS JUST TOO COLD, OR WINDY. THIS EVENT IS CANCELED!

Join Steve O. and Bill_J for an easy day of Kayaking. We will go up the Souhegan river. Steve O. lives on the river. We can also go to one of the local lakes with in a few miles of Steve's place. Bring bug spray, sunscreen, and something to eat/drink. We will stop along the way and eat. Please contact Steve or Bill for more info.

Steve O. has an extra kayak and a canoe if anyone would like to use them?
Bill_J has a 16' tandem kayak for use by anyone who can safely transport it.
If interested in any of these boats, please contact us as soon as you can for dibs + to make arrangements

Future trips may involve getting group rate rentals at other locations.
item.name: Kayak the Souhegan River - an easy, beginner level paddling event
